description: Create a raw material transaction sales customer
permissions: Admins can create raw material transaction sales customers. Non-admin users can create when they are a member of the related broker; the policy also allows creation when customer or broker is missing, but validations may reject it.
side_effects: Creates a raw material transaction sales customer record.
validation_notes: --raw-sales-customer-id and --customer are required. The broker is derived from the customer and must match broker rules. raw_sales_customer_id must be present and is unique per broker.
